attributes.action: Respect the 2016 referendum result and make sure the UK leaves the EU.
attributes.additional_details: Both parties labour and the conservatives had manifestos stating they would leave. All of parliament voted for article 50 but we still have not left or have a plan to leave. We still have a parliament trying to remain.
attributes.background: 17.4 mil people voted to leave the EU in 2016 many people since have tried to remain using all types of things like, another vote and remaining in the single market and customs union. We voted leave and this should be respected and we should leave.
